lead_paragraph: Resignations from BP's fuel-oil team have extended globally, with the departure of three traders from its United States office, including the team leader, and the head trader in London, three industry sources said on Monday, Reuters reported.
snippet: Resignations from BP's fuel oil team have extended globally, with the departure of three traders from its U.S. office, including the team leader, and the head trader in London, three industry sources said on Monday.

headline.main: Three BP Fuel Oil Traders in U.S. Quit

abstract: Resignations from BP's fuel oil team have extended globally, with the departure of three traders from its U.S. office, including the team leader, and the head trader in London, three industry sources said on Monday.
